secondaries.shortDescription: End of battle round, score point for each units destroyed by melee attacks by ORKS depending on the GRETCHIN units lost

subObjectives.description: the number of enemy units destroyed by melee attacks made by ORKS units from your army this battle round is more than the number of non-GRETCHIN units from your army destroyed by melee attacks this battle round.

the number of enemy units destroyed by melee attacks made by ORKS units from your army this battle round is at least 2 and is at least double the number of non-GRETCHIN units from your army destroyed by melee attacks this battle round.

secondaries.shortDescription: Score 1 point for each table quarter that contains 10 or more ORKS models from your army (Excluding units 3'' within any other table quarter)

subObjectives.description: You have a table quarter with 10 or more ORK model (Excluding those 3'' within any other table quarter)

secondaries.shortDescription: ORKS CODE units can attempt Get da Good Bitz (From end of movement up to end of turn if LOOTAS or Gretchin, otherwise next command phase)

subObjectives.description: a unit from your army completes this action
